FuncDef: This command enables logging of DS-3 and E-3 alarms for a DS-3/E-3 port or channel.
CLIs: report-alarm [ ais ] [ los ] [ oof ] [ rai ] [ looped ]
no report-alarm [ ais ] [ los ] [ oof ] [ rai ] [ looped ]

ParaDef.Info: Reports alarm indication signal errors. When configured, ais alarms are not raised and cleared. ParamDefault: Default- ais alarms are issued
Reports loss of signal errors. When configured, los traps are not raised and cleared. ParamDefault: Default- los traps are issued
Reports out-of-frame errors. When configured, oof alarms are not raised and cleared. ParamDefault: Default- oof alarms are not issued
Reports resource availability indicator events. When configured, rai events are not raised and cleared. ParamDefault: Default- rai alarms are not issued
Reports looped packets errors. ParamDefault: Default- looped alarms are not issued
